metadata.title: RHSA-2019:1022: python-jinja2 security update (Important)
metadata.description:
The python-jinja2 package contains Jinja2, a template engine written in pure Python. Jinja2 provides a Django inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional sandboxed environment. 

Security Fix(es):

* python-jinja2: Sandbox escape due to information disclosure via str.format (CVE-2016-10745)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2016-10745 python-jinja2: Sandbox escape due to information disclosure via str.format

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
python-jinja2 is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
